    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AboutUsController
    Controller class for the "About Us" page of the Vehix Rentals application.
    AboutUsUserController
    Controller class for the "About Us" page of the Vehix Rentals user interface.
    AccountCreationController
    Controller class for the account creation view in VehixRentals application.
    AddVehicleController
    Controller class for the Add Vehicle view in VehixRentals application.
    AdminBookingHistoryController
    Controller class for the Admin Booking History view.
    ApprovalController
    Controller class for managing rental approval requests in the VehixRentals application.
    ApprovalTemplateController
    Controller class for the rental approval template in VehixRentals application.
    BookingHistoryController
    Controller class for managing the booking history view in Vehix Rentals application.
    BookingHistoryItemTemplateController
    Controller class for individual booking history items in the Vehix Rentals application.
    CreateRentalViewController
    Controller class for the vehicle rental creation view in Vehix Rentals application.
    DashboardController
    Controller class for the Dashboard view in the VehixRentals application.
    DashboardTemplateController
    Controller for the dashboard rental template card in the VehixRentals application.
    DBConnection
    Provides a utility for establishing and managing a connection to a Microsoft SQL Server database using JDBC.
    EditVehicleController
    Controller class for editing vehicle information in the Vehix Rentals application.
    Feedback
    Represents a feedback given by a user in the vehicle rental system.
    FeedbackController
    Controller class for managing rental approval requests in the VehixRentals application.
    FeedbackDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Feedback records in the VehixRentals system.
    FeedbackService
    The FeedbackService class provides services related to handling customer feedback within the VehixRentals system.
    FeedbackTemplateController
    Controller for the dashboard rental template card in the VehixRentals application.
    HomeController
    Controller class for the home/dashboard view in Vehix Rentals application.
    LoginController
    Controller class for handling user interactions on the login screen of the VehixRentals application.
    LoginDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for login-related database operations.
    LoginDAO.LoginRecord
    Simple data class for returning login records.
    LoginService
    Service class responsible for handling login-related operations, including user authentication and retrieval of login details.
    LoginSession
    Singleton class to manage the current logged-in user or staff session.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the VehixRentals JavaFX application.
    RegisterController
    Controller class for handling the registration logic in the VehixRentals application.
    RegisterService
    Service class responsible for handling user registration processes, including creating login credentials and user or staff profiles.
    Rental
    Represents a rental transaction in the VehixRentals system.
    RentalDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Rental records in the VehixRentals system.
    RentalService
    Service class responsible for handling rental-related operations, including retrieving vehicle details based on rental information.
    RentController
    Controller class for the vehicle rental application.
    SecurityService
    Handles password hashing and authentication using PBKDF2 with individual salts.
    Staff
    The Staff abstract class represents a generic staff member in the VehixRentals system.
    StaffDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Staff records in the VehixRentals system.
    StaffNavbarController
    Controller for the staff navigation bar in the VehixRentals application.
    User
    Represents a User in the Vehix Rentals system.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing User records in the VehixRentals system.
    UserNavbarController
    Controller class for the User Navigation Bar in the VehixRentals application.
    UserService
    Service class responsible for user-related operations such as viewing available vehicles and retrieving rentals made by a user.
    Vehicle
    A class representing a vehicle in the VehixRentals system.
    VehicleDAO
    Data Access Object for vehicle operations, properly mapping all Vehicle model attributes to the database schema.
    VehicleItemAdminTemplateController
    Controller class for the vehicle item UI template displayed to administrators.
    VehicleItemTemplateController
    Controller class for the Vehicle Item Template used in the customer-facing view.
    VehiclesController
    Controller for the Vehicles view, which displays a scrollable list of vehicles and provides functionality to navigate to the Add Vehicle screen.
    VehicleService
    Service class to manage vehicle-related operations such as adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving vehicles from the database.
    VehicleUsageData
     
    VehixAlert
    Utility class for displaying styled JavaFX alert dialogs with application-specific icon.
    VehixImage
    Utility class for handling image loading in the VehixRentals application.
